basics.name: Vikas Sharma
basics.label: AI Research Analyst
basics.summary: AI Research Analyst and Tech Entrepreneur specializing in machine learning, artificial intelligence, robotics, and software development. Founded innovative startups, led IEEE chapters, and developed cutting-edge AI solutions. B.Tech graduate in AI & Data Science with expertise in bridging research and real-world applications. Based in Jaipur, Rajasthan, India.
